alert.note: Alert for Chase; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 7:35PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Perkins, southern Keith, Chase, southwestern Lincoln and western Hayes Counties through 815 PM CDT/715 PM MDT/... At 733 PM CDT/633 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking weak thunderstorms but containing strong winds along a line extending from near Roscoe to 10 miles northeast of Lamar to 9 miles north of Wray. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust will reduce visibility. Locations impacted include... Imperial, Grant, Wauneta, Wallace, Madrid, Elsie, Lamar, Enders, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Champion, Crete, Chase, Grainton, Center Dam Campground, Brandon, Wild Horse Spring, Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area, Area A Campground and Church Grove Campground. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 25 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT/900 PM MDT/ for southwestern Nebraska.
